topic: Position open for daylighting simulation expert
body:
Dear all,


this position is so closely related to the subscribers of the list, that it seams to be justified to share it even though it is not related to the technical discussion around Radiance:




For the position opened at Specialist Modelling Group, we are looking for young talent people with a solid knowledge of lighting and daylighting simulation techniques. The general requirements for this position is attached. Please help us forward it to your students and others who you think could make good candidates. It is very much appreciated. Thank you very much.




Anyone who is interested and thinks he / she may be the perfect candidate for this exciting job may directly get into contact with


Xiaoming Yang, Fosters+Partners
xiyang at fosterandpartners.com


Cheers, Lars.
